Prison hunger strike: Notorious criminal Dean Wickliffe released from prison immediately, ends 16-day hunger strike https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/prison-hunger-strike-notorious-criminal-dean-wickliffe-released-from-prison-immediately-ends-16-day-hunger-strike/ZN72S6JADZGVFFLJ67S2YHR4OU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/prison-hunger-strike-notorious-criminal-dean-wickliffe-released-from-prison-immediately-ends-16-day-hunger-strike/ZN72S6JADZGVFFLJ67S2YHR4OU/ The 77-year-old prisoner has been on a hunger strike for over two weeks.
